hero.subtitle: Long ago, in distant times, there existed melodies that lived only in dreams. They were called Dulcets. Their tones were as pure as starlight, said to help people forget their sorrows. Eventually, people borrowed that name, seeking all beautiful sounds.

about.title: About Us
about.lead_description: Dulcets is a creative team specializing in music production, video creation, illustration, and 3D modeling. We bring your ideas to life and deliver works that resonate with hearts.
about.content: We are dedicated to crafting unique and captivating Japanese anime songs, J-pop, J-Rock, and background music (BGM). Whether it's an exhilarating theme song or a heart-touching insert track, our team meticulously refines every note. Our composers, arrangers, and mixing engineers are not only experts in these musical styles but also have a keen eye for detail. We believe that each client has distinct musical needs, so we tailor each piece to perfectly fit your project and exceed your expectations. Let's bring your musical vision to life together.

jrock.title: J-ROCK
jrock.subtitle: Japanese Rock
jrock.content: We specialize in creating unique and captivating Japanese rock music. From exciting theme songs to heart-touching insert tracks, our team meticulously refines every note. Our composers, arrangers, and mixing engineers are not only experts in these musical styles but also have an absolute commitment to excellence.

jpop.title: J-POP
jpop.subtitle: Japanese Pop
jpop.content: We specialize in Japanese pop music production that combines catchy melodies with modern sounds. From idol songs to artist tracks, we create appealing music that fits the times. We combine the energy of pop music with Japan's unique beauty to create works that remain in listeners' hearts.

idol.title: IDOL
idol.subtitle: Idol Music
idol.content: We have extensive experience in music production for idol groups and solo artists. From songs that combine cuteness and performance to deep songs that express growth, we create music that maximally brings out the artist's charm. We create songs that capture fans' hearts with danceable beats and memorable hooks.

orchestra.title: ORCHESTRA
orchestra.subtitle: Orchestral Music
orchestra.content: We create music that fuses the grandeur of classical orchestras with the innovation of modern music. We produce emotionally rich and impressive orchestral music including film music, game soundtracks, and anime BGM. With precise arrangements that utilize the characteristics of each instrument, we provide musical experiences that deeply resonate in listeners' hearts.

edm.title: EDM
edm.subtitle: Electronic Dance Music
edm.content: We specialize in music production incorporating the latest electronic dance music trends. We handle a wide range from hard beats that shine in club scenes to sophisticated electronica for listening. We combine innovative sound design with Japan's unique musicality to create internationally viable music.

custom_music.title: Custom Music Production
custom_music.description: We create original music from scratch tailored to our clients' brands and stories.

comprehensive_support.title: Comprehensive Support
comprehensive_support.description: We provide end-to-end support from composition and arrangement to mixing and mastering.

diverse_vocals.title: Diverse Vocal Lineup
diverse_vocals.description: We have many female singers who are native speakers of English and Japanese, providing vocals for various needs.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Smooth communication is possible in Japanese, English, and Chinese.

cross_media.title: Cross-Media Support
cross_media.description: We handle not only music production but also consultations for video and 3D MV production.
